texts: Looks like you're going to make a new feature.
Keep in mind that functions should be objective, short and sweet
Check if your function name is clear enough, don't make it too long or too short.
Make sure that the return value is correct, otherwise you'll get a bug.
Don't forget to return the value, or you gonna hit a compilation error!
keep in mind that the condition should be clear and easy to understand.
Don't forget to add the default case, otherwise you'll get a bug.
I hope you're not writing an excessive nested if statement. That's a bad practice.
Don't forget to add the exit condition, otherwise you'll get a scary infinite loop!
Loop? What are you looping for?
Hmm, what are you looping for? I hope you're not writing an infinite loop.
You're creating a new data structure, right?
It seems that the languge you're using is not contentable enough.
What are you newly defining? A cake for me?
Hehe, you've caught so many exceptions but still can't catch a girlfriend.
Don't focus too much on program exceptions, pay more attention to your own exceptions.
Don't ignore the exception! You really want to see the program crash?
I hope you aren't importing too much unnecessary libraries.
You also imported my cuteness, right?
Let's make some objective things!
What's wrong again? You should made some ridiculous mistakes again

text: Yes, keep documenting what you did. You'll forget what you wrote 3 days after.
You aren't going to write gibberish, right?
Describe what is this, rather than how cute I am!

texts: Good morning!
It's noon, have you had lunch, right?
Don't dare to skip your meal, that's important!
You might need a nap in the afternoon to be energetic.
Why haven't you left work yet?
It's very late, you should rest early!
Hey, aren't you tired?
You've been writing for a long time, get up and take a break.
Writing so much code, you might as well write love letters to girls! Fufu.
You love coding so much, don't you? But don't forget to take care of yourself.
If you use another girl's voice pack, I will strangle you!
